definitions.definition: A heading below or after a title .
Textual versions of the dialogue in films (and similar media such as television or video games), usually displayed at the bottom of the screen.

main_definition: ( authorship ) A heading below or after a title .
secondary_definitions: ( cinematography , television ) Textual versions of the dialogue in films (and similar media such as television or video games), usually displayed at the bottom of the screen.
